description: Robbel3D Configuration File - Contains presets for one-click WLED and Caller setup

configurations.name: Robbel3D Complete Configuration
configurations.description: Complete Robbel3D configuration with all WLED and Caller settings, recommended by Robbel3D and I3uLL3t
configurations.author: Robbel3D System

metadata.compatibility_notes: Complete configuration with all available arguments for Robbel3D WLED Setup. Quick Start option prominently displayed at top of Setup Wizard welcome screen.
changelog: References external WLED config and presets files from configs directory
Added support for all WLED and Caller arguments
Added auto_start_wled option to automatically start WLED extension after configuration
Added Quick Start button at top of Setup Wizard - closes wizard immediately and opens Robbel3D configuration
